### <span style="display: block; text-align: center;">Strengthening Your Grant Applications</span>

:::: {.columns .v-center-container}

::: {.column width="42%"}
![](slide_figures/DMSP-plan.png){width=92%}

<div style="margin-top:0.6em; font-size:0.9em; line-height:1.3;">
<strong>NIH expects plans for:</strong><br>
• Code & software<br>
• Data management & sharing<br>
• Computational resources
</div>
:::

::: {.column width="58%"}
<div style="font-size:0.9em; line-height:1.4;">

**If your project includes high-dimensional data, an expert bioinformatician makes the proposal stronger.**

</div>

<div style="margin-top:0.6em; font-size:0.75em; line-height:1.4;">
  <ul class="checklist">
    <li>Assays chosen with clear rationale</li>
    <li>Experimental design avoids QC pitfalls</li>
    <li>Named personnel to analyze data</li>
    <li>Code &amp; software packages specified</li>
    <li>Compute &amp; storage resources identified</li>
    <li>Results visualization approach defined</li>
  </ul>
</div>

:::

::::

::: {.notes}
NIH increasingly emphasizes robust data management and data analysis plans •• We help you craft compelling data management and sharing plans, justify your analytical approaches, and budget appropriately for computational resources
:::

typical struggle of a newcomer—scattered project backups, outdated data, and a mess of scripts with no version control or clear organization. Multiple ‘final’ versions and non-reproducible code can derail even the best intentions, leaving you lost in meeting notes and random outputs. ••  Our organized file structure, complete documentation, and controlled, reproducible workflows set you up for success. Partnering with us means leveraging our expertise to turn your data into actionable insights, saving you time and frustration.

### <span style="display: block; text-align: center;">Sharing Our Experience through Resources</span>

<!--<img src="slide_figures/resources-ecosystem.png" alt="Hub diagram showing expertise at center radiating out to documentation, web applications, interactive reports, and community resources">-->

**Expertise that scales across the cancer center**

**Documentation Hub:** Best practices & troubleshooting accessible to all
**Interactive Reports:** Transform pipeline outputs into explorable insights  
**Custom Applications:** DECODeR, HeatPath, ClusterPicker for data exploration
**Community Resources:** Monthly journal clubs, walk-in hours, training materials

::: {.notes}
Last slide before Demos: Our expertise doesn't just benefit direct collaborators we've built comprehensive resources that support the entire cancer center community. Our Bioinformatics Hub provides dynamic documentation that evolves with the field. We create interactive reports that transform standard pipeline outputs into comprehensive, explorable documents. Our custom applications like DECODeR for differential expression visualization, HeatPath for pathway exploration, and ClusterPicker for pattern discovery address specific bottlenecks we see repeatedly. These aren't just convenience tools they're solutions built from our collaborative experience, making sophisticated analyses accessible while maintaining analytical rigor.
:::
